com.technototes.library.control.gamepad

Interface GamepadTrigger<T extends GamepadButton>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Gamepad Button
    All Superinterfaces:
    Trigger<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandAxis, CommandButton

    public interface GamepadTrigger<T extends GamepadButton>
extends Trigger<T>
    Class for gamepad-command integration
